```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(scales)
library(hubnR)

library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

theme_set(theme_hubnr())

library(gganimate)
```

```{r}
ff_history <- read_csv("data/ff-history-2017-2022.csv")
```

```{r}
ff_history %>% 
  group_by(player,pos) %>% 
  summarise(pts = sum(points)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(pts))
```

```{r}
top20 <- ff_history %>% 
  filter(year == 2021) %>% 
  group_by(player,pos) %>% 
  summarise(pts = sum(points)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(pts)) %>% 
  head(20)
```

```{r}
ff_history %>% 
  filter(year == 2021,
         player %in% top20$player
         ) %>% 
  #mutate(player = fct_rev(factor(player, levels = top20$player))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(points, player)) +
  geom_col()
```


```{r}
ranked_by_week <- ff_history %>% 
  filter(year == 2021) %>% 
  select(year, week, player, pos, points) %>% 
  group_by(week) %>% 
  arrange(week, -points) %>% 
  mutate(rank = 1:n()) %>% 
  filter(rank <= 10)
```

```{r}
myplot <- ranked_by_week %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(xmin = 0,
      xmax = points) +
  aes(ymin = rank -.45,
      ymax = rank + .45,
      y = rank) + 
  facet_wrap(~week) + 
  geom_rect(alpha = .7) + 
  aes(fill = pos) +
  scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "magma", direction = -1) + 
  scale_x_continuous(
    limits = c(-40,60),
    breaks = c(0,10,20,30,40,50,60)
  ) + 
  geom_text(
    col = "gray13",
    hjust = "right",
    aes(label = player), x = -3, family = "Roboto", size = 4) + 
  scale_y_reverse()

myplot
```

```{r}
myplot +
  facet_null() + 
  geom_text(x = 50, y = -10, family = "Roboto",
            aes(label = as.character(week)),
            size = 15, col = "grey18") + 
  aes(group = player) +
  transition_time(week)
```

```{r}
player_cum <- ff_history %>% 
  complete(year, week, player, fill = list(points = 0)) %>% 
  group_by(year,week) %>% 
  arrange(year, week) %>% 
  mutate(week_id = cur_group_id()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  group_by(player) %>% 
  arrange(week_id) %>% 
  mutate(cum_points = cumsum(points)) %>% 
  ungroup()

cum_ranked_by_week <- player_cum %>% 
  select(week_id, year, week, player, pos, cum_points) %>% 
  group_by(week_id) %>% 
  arrange(week_id, -cum_points) %>% 
  mutate(rank = 1:n()) %>% 
  filter(rank <= 10)
```

```{r}
cum_plot <- cum_ranked_by_week %>% 
  ggplot() +
  aes(xmin = 0,
      xmax = cum_points) +
  aes(ymin = rank -.45,
      ymax = rank + .45,
      y = rank) + 
  facet_wrap(~week_id) + 
  geom_rect(alpha = .7) + 
  #aes(fill = pos) +
  #scale_fill_viridis_d(option = "magma", direction = -1) + 
  scale_x_continuous(
    limits = c(-300,1400),
    breaks = c(0,400,800,1200)
  ) + 
  geom_text(
    col = "gray13",
    hjust = "right",
    aes(label = player), x = -30, family = "Roboto", size = 4) + 
  scale_y_reverse()

cum_plot
```

```{r}
anim <- cum_plot +
  facet_null() +
  scale_x_continuous(
    limits = c(-300,1600),
    breaks = c(0,400,800,1200,1600)
  ) + 
  geom_text(x = 1450, y = -9.5,
            family = "Roboto",
            aes(label = paste0(year, " - ", week)),
            size = 5, col = "grey18") + 
  aes(group = player) +
  transition_time(week_id) +
  ease_aes('cubic-in-out')
```

```{r}
animate(anim, duration = 60, fps = 15)
```
